title: FICO Managed File Transfer System
desc:
Led the design and implementation of FICO's internal Managed File Transfer systemâ€”a scalable, secure, and high-performance infrastructure built with AWS, Terraform, and Python.

Serving as a customer-facing alternative to AWS Transfer Family, this system is now adopted across the organization. Worked closely with internal stakeholders to translate complex customer file-transfer requirements into automated ETL workflows, with full production deployment ownership.
highlights: Built scalable, secure file transfer infrastructure using AWS, Terraform, and Python
Designed as customer-facing alternative to AWS Transfer Family
Automated ETL workflows for complex file-transfer requirements
Full production deployment ownership and stakeholder management
Featured in official AWS Blog post for modernizing data transfer at scale
